LanguageData.DMS_DoorBreaker.label: Door Buster
LanguageData.DMS_DoorBreaker.description: A specially design battering ram for mech breachers which has a built-in launcher and explosive ram head.
LanguageData.DMS_DoorBreaker.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_DoorBreaker.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_DoorBreaker.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Door Buster
LanguageData.DMS_Machete.label: Machete
LanguageData.DMS_Machete.description:
It May look like a normal machete, but this weapon is purpose built for a mech melee combat capability.
With its high frequency vibrating edge, it can cut through most things with ease.
LanguageData.DMS_Machete.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.DMS_Machete.tools.point.label: point
LanguageData.DMS_Machete.tools.edge.label: edge
LanguageData.DMS_StunBaton.label: Stun Baton
LanguageData.DMS_StunBaton.description: An electric stun baton designed for non-lethal riot control and to Subdue out-of-control machines. It's commonly used by automatroid protectors to secure occupied areas safely without casualties.
LanguageData.DMS_StunBaton.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.DMS_StunBaton.tools.point.label: point
LanguageData.DMS_StunBaton.tools.edge.label: edge
